movies.title: Feux croisés sur Broadway
movies.plot: (1969) George Nader, Heinz Weiss, Heidy Bohlen. An FBI agent is killed by the mob after making off with five million in gold bars in a robbery gone bad. Agent Jerry Cotton is called in to bring the gang to justice and find out where his dead pal hid the missing gold. Color, 35mm.
movies.simplePlot: (1969) George Nader, Heinz Weiss, Heidy Bohlen. An FBI agent is killed by the mob after making off with five million in gold bars in a robbery gone bad. Agent Jerry Cotton is called in to ...

biography.bio: Born in Pasadena, California, George Nader became interested in acting while still in school and appeared in several productions at the Pasadena Playhouse. This led to several small parts in movies before earning the lead role in the infamous 3D thriller Robot Monster (1953). The movie was bad but profitable, and Nader soon had a contract with Universal Pictures. Unfortunately, the studio already had on its roster such good-looking and athletic actors as Rock Hudson, Tony Curtis and Jeff Chandler, so Nader often found himself being cast in their leftovers, usually playing parts that emphasized his "beefcake" appeal. (At 6' 1" and 180 pounds, Nader had the kind of physique fan magazines drooled over and unlike many of his colleagues, he frequently appeared with his chest hair intact.) However, he did enjoy a few good years in the mid-1950s, turning in a commendable performance in Away All Boats (1956) before his career began to decline. He tried his hand at three TV series and then relocated to Europe, where he enjoyed a modest revival in the late 1960s starring as "Jerry Cotton" in a series of West German films.
biography.name: George Nader

biography.bio: Heinz Weiss was born on June 12, 1921 in Stuttgart, Germany. He was an actor, known for The Great Escape (1963), Das Traumschiff (1981) and As Far as My Feet Will Carry Me (1959). He was married to Elfriede. He died on November 20, 2010 in Grünwald, Munich, Germany.
biography.name: Heinz Weiss

biography.bio: Heidy Bohlen is an actress, known for The Sensuous Three (1972), Feux croisés sur Broadway (1969) and The Long Swift Sword of Siegfried (1971).
biography.name: Heidy Bohlen

biography.bio: Miha Baloh was born on May 21, 1928 in Jesenice, Slovenia, Yugoslavia. He is an actor, known for Winnetou: The Last Shot (1965), Omer Pacha (1971) and Elle et lui (1961).
biography.name: Miha Baloh

biography.bio: Michaela May was born on March 18, 1952 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany as Gertraud Berta Mittermayr. She is an actress, known for Bukow and König (1971), Der Bergdoktor (1992) and Trouble-fête (2015). She has been married to Bernd Schadewald since June 16, 2006. She was previously married to Dr. Jack Schiffer.
biography.name: Michaela May

biography.bio: Horst Naumann was born on November 17, 1925 in Dresden, Germany. He is known for his work on Das Traumschiff (1981), The Black Forest Clinic (1985) and Bedroom Stewardesses (1968). He has been married to Martina Linn since August 12, 2010. He was previously married to Christa von Arvedi.
biography.name: Horst Naumann

biography.bio: Konrad Georg was born on December 25, 1914 in Mainz, Germany. He was an actor, known for Kommissar Freytag (1963), And Jimmy Went to the Rainbow's Foot (1971) and Mexikanische Revolution (1968). He died on September 8, 1987 in Hamburg, West Germany.
biography.name: Konrad Georg

biography.bio: Herbert Fux was born on March 25, 1927 in Hallein, Austria. He was an actor and writer, known for Der Bergdoktor (1992), Les trois mousquetaires (1993) and Woyzeck (1979). He was married to Edith. He died on March 13, 2007 in Zürich, Zürich, Switzerland.
biography.name: Herbert Fux

biography.bio: Manfred Reddemann was born on November 9, 1939 in Coesfeld, Germany. He is an actor, known for Battle of Britain (1969), Hagbard and Signe (1967) and Charleys Tante (1976).
biography.name: Manfred Reddemann

biography.bio: Karl-Heinz Thomas is an actor, known for Le pain du boulanger (1976), Zur blauen Palette (1967) and Feux croisés sur Broadway (1969).
biography.name: Karl-Heinz Thomas

biography.bio: Ulli Kinalzik was born on February 26, 1939 in Grabów nad Prosna, Wielkopolskie, Poland as Hans-Ulrich Kinalzik. He is an actor and writer, known for Direktion City (1976), Verschwörung in Ulm - Der Reichswehrprozeß 1930 (1971) and The Neverending Story III (1994). He has been married to Rita Engelmann since 1970.
biography.name: Ulli Kinalzik

biography.bio: Arthur Brauss was born on July 24, 1936 in Augsburg, Germany. He is an actor, known for Großstadtrevier (1986), Cross of Iron (1977) and The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick (1972). He is married to Marie Poccolin.
biography.name: Arthur Brauss

biography.bio: Rudolf Fernau was born on January 7, 1898 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany as Andreas Rudolf Neuberger. He was an actor, known for Dr. Crippen (1942), Mordprozeß Dr. Jordan (1949) and The Strangler of Blackmoor Castle (1963). He was married to Olga von Mahr. He died on November 4, 1985 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Rudolf Fernau

biography.bio: Hans Heyde is an actor, known for The Corrupt Ones (1967), The Counterfeit Killer (1968) and Dead Run (1967).
biography.name: Hans Heyde

biography.bio: Gerd Frickhöffer was born on November 21, 1913 in Tianjin as Gerhard Emil Karl Josef Frickhöffer. He was an actor, known for Percy Stuart (1969), Sergeant Berry (1974) and The Oil Prince (1965). He was married to Irene Korb. He died on July 5, 1980 in Baden-Baden, Baden-Württemberg, West Germany.
biography.name: Gerd Frickhöffer
